EmailTemplate.name: 202008_Americas_ATR_Air-and-Thermal_On24_Webinar.Invite 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Tomorrow: Honeywell Aerospace Commercial Airline Webinar Series
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Portal <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> | View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Forward to a friend <[[{{system.forwardToFriendLink}}]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/08/uv-cabin-system-webinar?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_americas_atr_hygiene&utm_content=webinar-invite&utm_term=a]]> Don't forget to sign up! The first webinar in our series, Avionics and Lighting, starts tomorrow. Join your Honeywell In-Service Engineers for a 3-part webinar series covering the latest technical updates on open product investigations. Here are the webinar dates and topics that will be covered: Avionics and Lighting – August 19
- RDR-4000 Weather Radar - IMMR GPS - TCAS TPA100 - Airbus & Boeing FMS - ADIRU Drift, Processor Card (Airbus), and Lifecycle Mgmt - EGPWS Reset Update - DEU BP15 & DU Blanking Update - 737 NG Exterior Lights
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/08/americas-avionics-and-lighting?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=webinar]]>
DATE August 19, 2020
TIME 10:00 a.m. - 11:45 a.m. CDT
LOCATION Online and On-Demand Air & Thermal – August 26
- Pack Flow Temp Controller, PN 51090248-005, S/W & mod update - B737 Temp Control Valve, Cabin Rate of Climb Issue - PRSOV & HPSOV, IP Check Valve Corrsion - GE LEAP Engine Starter and LEAP 1A Starter Air Valve
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/08/americas-air-and-thermal?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=webinar]]>
DATE August 26, 2020
TIME 10:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m. CDT
LOCATION Online and On-Demand Mechanical Systems – September 2
- 131-9A Reliability & Technical Updates - 131-9B Reliability & Technical Updates - 331-350 Reliability & Technical Updates
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/09/americas-mechanical-systems?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=webinar]]>
DATE September 2, 2020
TIME 10:00 a.m. - 12:30 p.m. CDT
LOCATION Online and On-Demand <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]>
